summary: Iteration 14 - Tested new features: Dashboard value_by_status, sales_manager_leaderboard, multi-select filters (project_type_ids, location_codes, sales_manager_ids), Sales Manager in Excel exports and ProjectSummary, shared calculation utility. All backend API tests passed (10/10). All frontend UI tests passed.

issues: Console warnings about Recharts width/height -1 (cosmetic, charts render correctly)
React hydration warnings about <span> inside <tbody>/<tr> (cosmetic, tables render correctly)

critical_code_review_comments: Consider wrapping dynamic table row mappings with React.Fragment instead of span to eliminate hydration warnings
seed_data_creation: Created test sales manager and project for leaderboard testing (auto-cleaned up)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 14 tested new features successfully: Dashboard value_by_status breakdown cards (Draft/In Review/Approved/Rejected values), Sales Manager Leaderboard table with 7 columns (#, Sales Manager, Total Value, Projects, Approved, Rejected, Approval Rate), multi-select pill button filters (Project Types: 7 options, Project Locations: 20 options, Sales Managers: 2 options), Apply/Clear filter buttons, Sales Manager field in ProjectSummary Project Details card and Excel export, shared calculations utility at /frontend/src/utils/calculations.js imported by ProjectSummary. One project exists with Sales Manager (Said Abdulrahman - S/4H Public Cloud). Backend endpoint /api/dashboard/analytics accepts comma-separated filter params. All features working correctly.

features_tested.dashboard_api_value_by_status: PASS - Returns draft, in_review, approved, rejected values
features_tested.dashboard_api_sales_manager_leaderboard: PASS - Returns array with name, total_projects, approved, rejected, approval_rate, total_value
features_tested.dashboard_ui_value_by_status_cards: PASS - Shows Draft Value ($2.7M), In Review Value ($1.7M), Approved Value ($2.0M), Rejected Value ($381K)
features_tested.dashboard_ui_leaderboard_table: PASS - Headers: #, Sales Manager, Total Value, Projects, Approved, Rejected, Approval Rate
features_tested.dashboard_ui_project_types_multiselect: PASS - 7 pill buttons, toggle selection works
features_tested.dashboard_ui_sales_managers_multiselect: PASS - 2 pill buttons (Arpit Agarwal, Said Abdulrahman)
features_tested.dashboard_ui_apply_button: PASS - Sends filter params to API
features_tested.project_summary_sales_manager_field: PASS - Shows 'Sales Manager: Said Abdulrahman' in Project Details card
features_tested.excel_export_sales_manager: PASS - ProjectSummary Excel export includes sales_manager_name at line 106
features_tested.shared_calculations_utility: PASS - /frontend/src/utils/calculations.js exists with calculateWaveSummary, calculateOverallSummary exports, imported by ProjectSummary
